de: The original video anime episode will serve as the final chapter to the television series, focusing on the rivalry between the "background character" Amatsuyu Kisaragi (Jouro) and Yasuo Hazuki (Hose), "the protagonist."
nm: Ore wo Suki nano wa Omae dake ka yo: Oretachi no Game Set
jp: Ore wo Suki nano wa Omae dake ka yo: Oretachi no Game Set
